MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: What is the main theme that explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Respiration | d: Mitosis

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT a major theme in biology?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Evolution | c: Photosynthesis | d: Regulation of internal environments

MCQ: What is the study of life at the molecular level of a cell called?
Choices: a: Ecology | b: Genetics | c: Anatomy | d: Physiology

MCQ: How long ago did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 million years ago | b: 100 million years ago | c: 1 billion years ago | d: 3.7 billion years ago
